name: Egradle
tagline: EGradle is a lightweight gradle integration for eclipse
body: # EGradle [![Build status:](https://travis-ci.org/de-jcup/egradle.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/de-jcup/egradle) ## In a nutshell EGradle is a lightweight gradle integration for eclipse More information can be found inside [Wiki](https://github.com/de-jcup/egradle/wiki). ## License EGradle is under Apache 2.0 license (http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0)
